name: Random Escape (ArmoredGameDev)
description:
use W/A/S/D to move

rotate around with your MOUSE

jump with SPACE

try to find treasuse(it is somewhere) and go back to start to WIN

in right up corner you have minimap, lives manager, text what is sayng if you have treasure

(i got 1 day to finish it so it is minimum viable project but it was fun to make)
